did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: San Francisco Planning and Urban Renewal records, [ca.1911-1969]

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: San Francisco Planning and Urban Renewal Association.

did.physdesc: Organizational records, reports, photographs, and printed materials.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes records related to housing planning and redevelopment; recreation; land use; organizational materials; social policy; and transportation.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: The San Francisco Housing Association became the San Francisco Planning and Housing Association, and then the San Francisco Planning and Urban Renewal Association (SPUR). It is now the San Francisco Planning and Urban Research Association.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes records related to housing planning and redevelopment; recreation; land use; organizational materials; social policy; and transportation. Includes paper of Don Emmons as president; reports on housing by Catherine Bauer Wurster; and records of the Pacific Southwest Council of the National Association of Housing and Redevelopment Officials.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: San Francisco Planning and Urban Renewal Association.
National Association of Housing and Redevelopment Officials. Pacific Southwest Council.
San Francisco Planning and Housing Association.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: San Francisco Planning and Urban Renewal records, #3199. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
